itunes:title: Misconceptions Of A Stylist
title: Misconceptions Of A Stylist
description: $24,000 is the average income of a hairstylist but believing that's all you're worth is just one of the many misconceptions about our industry. From not making good money to it not being a serious career, there are so many untruths out there. We're talking about the friend that always asks for a discount, the client that asks if you can just "slip them in" last minute, and the catty gossip that is non-stop. It's time to elevate your craft and ditch those misconceptions that are holding you back!

We're talking about the friend that always asks for a discount, the client that asks if you can just "slip them in" last minute, and the catty gossip that is non-stop. It's time to elevate your craft and ditch those misconceptions that are holding you back!
itunes:author: JZ Styles
